# NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.peerEnded

**Case**

The peer ended the session.

## Declaration

```swift
case peerEnded
```

## Discussion

The framework provides this removal reason when the peer app calls [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISession/invalidate()].

## Reasons

- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.timeout**: NI timed out the session.
- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.timeout**: NI timed out the session.
title: NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.peerEnded
